website_summaries.verdict: Packed with illustrations, this guide is easy to read, but may be too basic for those looking for in-depth information.
pros: Broken down into a mineral section and a rock section, each with a detailed introduction
377 entries in all, with more than 1,000 illustrations
Index is well organized and useful
cons: Not the guide for those looking for more scientific information
Some feel the binding is poor quality, or that the pictures are blurry

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book for mineral collectors
customer_reviews.text: I found the minerals covered and their color photographs to be amazingly useful compared to the other mineral books I own. Really glad I purchased this one, highly recommend to other collectors. NOTE: This is NOT a beginner's book - many terms will seem alien to someone new to rocks and minerals. But a beginner might still find the photos to be very useful in identifying a mineral.
